title: Group portrait of graduating nurses for completion of in home nursing and civil defense classes, including: Blanche Mock, Anna Mae Green, Cora Warren, Pearl Lane, Jessie B. Ray, Doris Willis, Margaret Oliver, Mattie Lumsford, Margaret Miller, Carrie Smith and Frances Brown, with Eunice Cook standing center right, gathered around table with Red Cross flag in interior with sign that reads "The Red Cross Services Home Nursing, Junior Red Cross, Nutrition Service First Aid", another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
